messages.author: sky
messages.text: Use () when referring to functions/methods, eg OnImplicitAnimationsCompleted()

messages.author: sky
messages.text: You don't call OnImplicitAnimationsCompleted() here. I think you mean 'Not we have to make sure OnImpli.. is called before ..'
